Leo Wolf is an artist and engineer. His music combines synthesis with processed samples, field recordings, and archival sounds to create hypnotic drones and textures. He also explores visual art mediums such as monotype printmaking.

His work is heavily inspired by themes of memory, time, and dreams. In both the audio and visual realms he investigates connections between the physical and metaphysical, the labyrinth of inner and outer realms that consistute our lived experiences.

Leo is the founder and curator of the drone and experimental label Blind Reading, formerly Dead Letters Archive, and co-founder of Sinetology, a North Carolina based electronic music label and collective with a focus on hardware and live events.
